Key Match Events: Aaron Judge committed a blunder in the outfield during the third inning against the Texas Rangers, allowing Marcus Semien to score from first base.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Aaron Judge, the frontrunner for AL MVP, has primarily been a right fielder throughout his MLB career, but is in his first year of effectively being a full-time center fielder.
Others: The Rangers got their first run on the play, and this has become a familiar refrain for the Yankees, with even star teammate Juan Soto recently being prone to mistakes in the outfield.
